mil3.6.9:1.2_0: “bhante nāgasena, yaṁ panetaṁ brūsi ‘saṁsāro’ti, katamo so saṁsāro”ti?
mil3.6.9:1.3_4: tahiṁ mato aññatra uppajjati, evaṁ kho, mahārāja,
mil3.6.9:1.5_1: kocideva puriso pakkaṁ ambaṁ khāditvā aṭṭhiṁ ropeyya,
mil3.6.9:1.5_2: tato mahanto ambarukkho nibbattitvā phalāni dadeyya,
mil3.6.9:1.5_3: atha so puriso tatopi pakkaṁ ambaṁ khāditvā aṭṭhiṁ ropeyya,
mil3.6.9:1.5_4: tatopi mahanto ambarukkho nibbattitvā phalāni dadeyya,
mil3.6.9:1.6_4: tahiṁ mato aññatra uppajjati, evaṁ kho, mahārāja,
